Name: Lollo Campaign III
Description: You have a new "Lollo Grocery Shopping" order. Please fulfill it in time.
QuestDesc: You have a new "Lollo Grocery Shopping" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The business today is "Lollo Grocery Shopping". Let me brief you on the background first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Field in the Port City of Guixu is expanding, and the nearby Xiehua Village has been included in the emergency evacuation area. The Ministry of Development and the Patrollers are already very busy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Merchants willing to go to Xiehua Village are few already because of the short distance to the Port City of Guixu. Now with the trouble in the Tacet Field...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The purpose of piloting this business is to help the villagers of Xiehua Village with "Lollo Grocery Shopping."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have ten new grocery orders. Please handle them on time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me see... 3 bags of flour and 2 bottles of cooking oil. You can buy them from Mahe's Grocery.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will do the purchasing with you. You can find the shopping list on your Terminal now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you've got everything done, meet me at Xiehua Village.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't recognize me just because I changed the outfit?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still feel nostalgic about this outfit. It fits me well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have already handed over the ingredients to my Patroller friends. They will distribute them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, by the way, I will transfer the expense and pay to you through the terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you tomorrow! Don't be late!
